title: Frequently Asked Questions

description.line1: Here are answers to some of

contactPrompt: If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us.

faqs.question: Are bath towels, pajamas, and toothbrushes provided?
faqs.answer: We kindly ask that you bring your own bath towels, pajamas, and toothbrushes. Basic amenities such as shampoo and conditioner are provided, so please rest assured.

faqs.question: Can we bring our own drinks?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are welcome to bring your own drinks. We provide water and tea, but you may also bring alcohol or juice of your choice. There is also a convenience store about 20 minutes away by car.

faqs.question: What should we do about the futon?
faqs.answer: You can lay out your futon at your own pace whenever you like. Please make yourself at home and relax.

faqs.question: Is it wheelchair accessible?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, as the house retains its traditional charm, it is not wheelchair accessible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

faqs.question: Is there an onsen nearby?
faqs.answer: There is an onsen called 'Kyuragi Onsen' about 15 minutes away by car. It is popular among locals and highly recommended.

faqs.question: Are there any tourist attractions?
faqs.answer: There aren't many flashy attractions, but you can enjoy the beauty of the changing seasons and visit local sake breweries to experience the charm of the region.

faqs.question: Are meals prepared and cleaned up for us?
faqs.answer: You will join the host and other guests in preparing and cleaning up meals together. It's a great way to make lasting memories of your trip.

faqs.question: What should I wear for the asparagus harvest experience?
faqs.answer: As you’ll be walking on soil in the fields, please wear comfortable clothes and shoes that you don’t mind getting dirty. A hat and towel are also recommended!
